text: He imanadaragana [1]! Tomara nijederake ebam tomadera paribara-parijanake raksa kara aguna theke [2], yara indhana habe manusa ebam pathara, yate niyojita ache nirmama, kathorasbabhaba pheresatagana, yara aman'ya kare na ta ya allaha taderake adesa karena. Ara tara ya karate adesapraapta haya ta-i kare
